_sText:
V4 changes:

- Elevator finally fixed I think. Changed from a func_train to a func_movelinear.
- Added a staircase to provide a second way to go from floor to floor. There's also a minor wallrail-thing where humans can sit on, although this is not too high, and humans should blockade the staircase entrances first if they want to stand a chance.
- Made the entrance to the area added in V3 a little wider.
